title: Disconnection in ranked/normal?
body: Did anyone just disconnected from their game and tried to reconnect but came up with the error " can not connect to server" but your internet was working perfectly?? I was in a ranked when this happen and was 10mins in i tried to reconnect a number of times but around 13mins it came up with the end of game stats and was i stuck on "skip waiting for status" I checked my match history and my game wasn't there??? am i the only one?

replies.body: that happenned to me but i just restarted my internet and it worked fine (my internet was working perfectly before)
